Row.Text: My heart is the heart of the mountain. My name is Lord Cataclysm. Let us shake the world.
I am Pachacuti, favored of the sun and child of the mountains. Shake in my presence as the earth itself does.
I am Pachacuti, favored of the sun and child of the mountains. Shake in my presence as the earth itself does.
I am Pachacuti, favored of the sun and child of the mountains. Shake in my presence as the earth itself does.
The puma, the condor, and the serpent call me to war! I cannot call them back!
Better to strike your weapons against the heart of the mountain; our warriors are stone.
Pachacuti, Lord Cataclysm, will live on in memory, if not in body.
A revelation that we will live by.
